samples: She read a book.

His blood pressure is normal.

She wrote a poem about love.
Time flies when you are having fun.

She works Monday through Friday each day.
He plans for the day ahead.

The week flew by quickly.

He was born last month.

He captured the moment in a photograph.
She has a memory of her childhood.
The photograph brings back a memory.

He follows his dream of becoming a pilot.

He stuck to his plan.

He shared his idea with the team.

He faced a problem at work.

He didn't know the answer.

She searched for the truth.

The war ended decades ago.
She saved money for a new car.

Be careful with that sharp knife.

He scooped soup with the spoon.

The desk drawer was full of pens.

The sofa cushions were very soft.

She made the bed every morning.

The radio station played her favorite song.

The map showed all the hiking trails.

The lock was rusty and hard to turn.

The mirror hung above the dresser.
She painted the wall blue.

The chandelier hung from the ceiling.
She painted the ceiling white.

The floor was covered in dust.

The roof leaked during the storm.

A single leaf fell to the ground.

The tree’s roots grew deep underground.
He examined the plant’s roots carefully.

The seed sprouted into a small plant.

The fruit was ripe and sweet.

He grows vegetables in his backyard.

The meat was tender and juicy.

She cooked the fish with lemon and herbs.

He ate a snack between meals.

He avoided dessert to save calories.

He prefers a wireless mouse.

The battery lasted all day.

The charger stopped working.
